alert.note: Alert for Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 5:19PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Plumas, Sierra, southeastern Lassen and southern Washoe Counties through 600 PM PDT... At 518 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hallelujah Junction, or 7 miles east of Chilcoot, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reno, Stead, Chilcoot-Vinton, Lemmon Valley, Hallelujah Junction, Cold Springs, Cold Springs Valley, Lemmon Valley-Golden Valley, Verdi-Mogul, Spanish Springs, Ca 70 At Plumas-Lassen Co Line, Us 395 At Sierra-Lassen Co Line, Stead Airport and Us 395 At Calif-Nevada Line Near Bordertown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
